Contents.Content: /*--病人基本信息--*/ select 病人编号 AS PatientCode, patient_no, name AS PatientName, 性别 AS PatientSex, birthday AS PatientBirthday, 年龄 AS PatientAge, idenno AS PatientIDCard,--身份证号 mcard_no AS PatientMcard,--医保卡号 home AS PatientAddress,--地址 linkman_tel AS PatientTel,--电话 是否高危 AS IsHighRiskInfectivity, /*--住院号--*/ inpatient_no AS InpatientNo, dept_name AS DeptName, 床位 AS BedNumber, 床位护士 AS BedNurse, /*--手术信息--*/ clinic_code AS ClinicCode,--病例号 手术室 AS OperationRoom, 科室 AS OperationDepartment, operationdate AS OperationDate, 手术台次 AS OperationOrderCode, 手术医生 AS OperationDoctor, 手术名称 AS OperationName, 洗手护士1 AS HandWashingNurse1, 洗手护士2 AS HandWashingNurse2, 巡回护士1 AS ItinerateNurse1, 巡回护士2 AS ItinerateNurse2, 手术状态 AS OperationStatus, 手术开始时间 AS OperationBegin, 手术结束时间 AS OperationEnd from v_infecon_住院信息 left join v_infecon_病人基本信息 on inpatient_no=patient_no left join v_infecon_手术信息 on inpatient_no=clinic_code where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 病人编号 as VALUE,--病人编号 病人编号 as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 name as NAME, --病人姓名 name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 patient_no, --住院信息 inpatient_no as SocialSecurityCard, --住院号 dept_name as WARDAREA,--病区 床位 as BEDNO --床位 from v_infecon_病人基本信息 left join v_infecon_住院信息 on patient_no=inpatient_no where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 病人编号 as VALUE,--病人编号 name as NAME, --病人姓名 name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 patient_no, 科室 as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT --科室 from v_infecon_病人基本信息 left join v_infecon_手术信息 on patient_no=clinic_code where 1=1 {0}

/*--病人基本信息--*/ select 病人编号 AS PatientCode, name AS PatientName, 性别 AS PatientSex, birthday AS PatientBirthday, 年龄 AS PatientAge, idenno AS PatientIDCard,--身份证号 mcard_no AS PatientMcard,--医保卡号 home AS PatientAddress,--地址 linkman_tel AS PatientTel,--电话 是否高危 AS IsHighRiskInfectivity, clinic_code,--挂号系统编号 是否急诊 AS OutPatientEmergency, reg_date, dept_name, seeno from v_infecon_病人基本信息 left join v_infecon_挂号信息 on 病人编号=clinic_code where 1=1 {0} order by reg_date Desc

select --病人基本信息 病人编号 as VALUE,--病人编号 name as NAME, --病人姓名 name as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 性别 as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 birthday as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 年龄 as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 clinic_code as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 reg_date as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 dept_name as REGISTERDEPARTMENT --挂号科室 from v_infecon_病人基本信息 left join v_infecon_挂号信息 on 病人编号=clinic_code where 1=1 {0} order by reg_date Desc
